video.title: How I hacked my friend without her noticing - Operation Luigi
video.description:
My friend gave me permission to "hack all her stuff" and this is my story. It's about what I tried, what worked, my many flubs, and how easy it is to compromise Non Paranoid People TM.

Talk given by Alex at PyCon Australia.

This talk is licensed under the creative commons license. It was originally posted on the PyCon Australia channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCS9sdEyduD9K83K3GkvQlOA

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.org

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.org

topLevelComment.author: Savage Stephen
topLevelComment.text: this video explains to you that hacking isnt some sort of super complicated thing that only mathematical geniuses can figure out but very simple processes and steps such as social engineering, online researching and investigating online activity

topLevelComment.author: Jay Squad
topLevelComment.text: Guarantee a tech savvy dev wouldn’t fall for your basic af phishing email. Easy to brag on a podium when you hacked a complete noob. topLevelComment.author: Cyberspykings gmail com
topLevelComment.text: The best -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- My dad is in the military and I couldn't even begin to describe how upset my dad would feel if my mom was cheating on him especially since she would be his second divorce while serving(his first didn't cheat she just couldn't do the whole &quot;moving all the time&quot; lifestyle). I'm so sorry that happened to him and I hope he found someone better and moved on with his life(I also hope she was shamed for cheating on him by her own family) Cheating should be a crime and punish as one. It hurts so many people and end some as well. Cheaters will never understand all the harm they do. P.s thanks for the shout out to GREATSPYZIE @ GMAIL.COM appreciate it an it was a surprise. Much love

topLevelComment.author: George Olivas
topLevelComment.text: *I was delighted to eventually be ending up with the man of dreams. Only for me to receive a reality check when he started acting funny during my 2nd trimester. Initially, i thought it was the becoming a dad fever but he grew cold romantically and emotional towards me. He complained and flared up at any given opportunity. Eventually, i decided to employ the services of a private investigator which made me realize he had a mistress at work. Apparently, asking for a divorce was a bitter pill to swallow but i had to. I’m in a better place now and my baby gives me all the joy i want and need. You can contact the private investigator via WhatsApp +1 (475) 500 5465*
